definition: King Lear, 1605 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
plum
surname Li
variant of 爾|尔[er3]
thus/so/like that/you/thou
surname Wang
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to rule/to reign over

sentences.english: Too long have I been feeling like Lir'schildren.
sentences.chinese: 长久以来，我感觉自己就好像李尔王的孩子。

sentences.english: The young actor was badly miscast as Lear / in the role of Lear.
sentences.chinese: 那个年轻演员扮演李尔王，这一角色安排很不合适。

sentences.english: King Lear's daughters stood by while his eyes were gouged out.
sentences.chinese: 李尔王被人挖去眼睛时，他的女儿就站在旁边。

sentences.english: Shakespeare's treatment of madness in "King Lear" is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚在《李尔王》中对疯癫的处理手法精妙绝伦。
